hazma.rambo.compute_decay_width¶

hazma.rambo.compute_decay_width(num_ps_pts, fsp_masses, cme, mat_elem_sqrd=<function <lambda>>, num_cpus=None)¶

Computes the cross section for a given process.

num_ps_pts : int
Total number of phase space points to generate.
masses : numpy.ndarray
List of masses of the initial state and final state particles.
cme : double
Center-of-mass-energy of the process.
mat_elem_sqrd : (double)(numpy.ndarray) {lambda klist: 1}
Function for the matrix element squared.
num_cpus : int {None}
Number of cpus to use in parallel with rambo. If not specified, 75% of the cpus will be used.
cross_section : double
Cross section for X -> final state particles(fsp), where the fsp have masses masses and the process X -> fsp has a squared matrix element of mat_elem_sqrd.
std : double
Estimated error in cross section.
